definition: not having anything at all (idiom); utterly lacking/without two sticks to rub together
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: I had noting in the world but a million-pound note.
sentences.chinese: 除了一張百萬英磅的鈔票外，我一無所有。

sentences.english: God's axes of trial have stripped and bared them.
sentences.chinese: 神的斧子將我們剝奪得一無所有。

sentences.english: Nothing is a treasure, it makes the poor have the impulse to change destiny.
sentences.chinese: 一無所有是一種財富，它讓窮人產生改變命運的衝動。

sentences.english: A man of business may talk of philosophy, a man who has none may practice it.
sentences.chinese: 商人也許會談談哲學，而一無所有者也許會施諸實踐。

sentences.english: All they had were memories of the days when God's favor was on them.
sentences.chinese: 他們一無所有，只剩下上帝向他們施恩時的回憶。

sentences.english: When winter came, the grasshopper had nothing, but the ant complained of chest pains.
sentences.chinese: 到了冬天，蚱蜢一無所有，可是螞蟻卻喊胸口疼。

sentences.english: I arrived in this country with zilch.
sentences.chinese: 我來到這個國家時身上一無所有。

sentences.english: I'm Miss. Longly. I have nobody.
sentences.chinese: 我是單身女士，孤獨地，一無所有。

sentences.english: The starkness of their living conditions shocked him.
sentences.chinese: 他們的生活條件一無所有，他感到十分震驚。

sentences.english: Apart from clothes and bedding, I have nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我除了行李被褥之外一無所有。

sentences.english: I had nothing in the world but a million-pound note.
sentences.chinese: 除了一張一百萬英鎊的鈔票外，我是一無所有。

sentences.english: If you have nothing to lose, you can try everything.
sentences.chinese: 如果你一無所有，反而可以放手去做。
除了一片廢墟外一無所有了。

sentences.english: Compared with holes, has nothing to more unfortunate.
sentences.chinese: 比起千瘡百孔，一無所有才更加不幸。

sentences.english: Now there is nothing but time.
sentences.chinese: 現在除了時間我一無所有。
